title: Noah's ark
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
description: Episode of Series "The Greatest Adventure Stories from the Bible". Part of the animated children's series 'Greatest adventure stories from the Bible', as seen from the perspective of 3 young visitors from the 20th century. An angry God punished the world for its wickedness, sparing only one man and his family; Noah. God orders Noah to construct a boat and take 2 kinds of every animal on board. Noah's faith is tested through fourty days and fourty nights of torrential rainfall.
related_objects: Series; S01034; The Greatest Adventure Stories from the Bible; Active; 1991
